definition[0]: behaving in a polite, kind, and generous way, especially to people of a lower rank
example[0]: Sibyl was the most gracious, helpful, and generous person to work with.
definition[1]: having the kind of expensive style, comfort, and beauty that only rich people can afford
definition[2]: a gracious act by or gift from God is kind and forgiving
definition[3]: used as a polite way of describing a royal person
